QuestData.Title: Good-Fer-Nothin' Slither-Dogs
QuestData.Description: Ahem! Hrm, hrm...$b$b<The dwarf clears his throat for several seconds.>$b$bYou're lookin' fer somethin' ta do? And ya come askin' ME? Lowly ol' Goris?!$b$bWell, ah... this is a first. Ah, I've got it!$b$bThe vale ta tha north is filled with a bunch o' useless, belly-scrapin' basilisks. They don't do nothin' for no one, and I hear they turned a guy ta stone once.$b$bIf ya kill 'em, I'll give ya some o' my stuff.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahem! Ahhh... right...$b$bWell done! And, congratulations, on killing them, I mean.$b$bHere you go.
